doc.field: New York University Archives Portrait Files
New York University Archives Portrait Files

The New York University Archives Portrait Files was created by the University Archives to make a central collection for reference staff fulfilling requests for information on individuals associated with the University. The collection consists of files containing photographs and negatives of portraits of New York University administrators, faculty, staff, alumni, donors, or invited guests. Materials date from the late 19th century through the early 21st century.

The New York University Archives Portrait Files consist of files containing photographs and negatives of portraits of New York University administrators, faculty, staff, alumni, donors, or invited guests. Materials date from the late 19th century through the early 21st century.

The New York University Archives Portrait Files was created by the University Archives to make a central collection for reference staff fulfilling requests for information on individuals associated with the University.
No information was recorded about the acquisition of the materials in this collection. An accretion was added in 2022.
